KnowledgeBase.Title: reverse
KnowledgeBase.ArgumentTypes: List Vector Matrix NumMatrix FltVector ShortVector IntVector NumVector ObjVector BitVector
KnowledgeBase.DataType: Vector Matrix List NumMatrix FltVector ShortVector IntVector NumVector ObjVector BitVector

Function.Description: The reverse function creates and returns a new Vector, List or Matrix, which contains the elements of the argument in reverse order.

Brief.Overview: The reverse function creates and returns a new Vector, which contains the elements of the argument {obj} in reverse order. The argument {obj} may be a proper List or a Vector.
Brief.Overview-Matrix: The reverse function creates and returns a new Matrix, which contains the elements of the argument {obj} in reverse order. The argument {obj} may be a proper List or a Matrix.
Brief.Overview-NumMatrix: The reverse function creates and returns a new NumMatrix, which contains the elements of the argument {obj} in reverse order. The argument {obj} may be a proper List or a NumMatrix.
Brief.Overview-List: The reverse function creates and returns a new List, which contains the elements of the argument {obj} in reverse order. The argument {obj} may be a proper List or a Vector.
Brief.Usage: Use the reverse function reorganizes the elements in a Vector, Matrix or List in reverse order.
Brief.Usage-Matrix:
Note: Returns an error message if the Matrix is not of rank one.

Use the reverse function reorganizes the elements in a Matrix in reverse order.
Brief.Usage-NumMatrix:
Note: Returns an error message if the NumMatrix is not of rank one.

Use the reverse function reorganizes the elements in a NumMatrix in reverse order.

Argument.Name: obj
Argument.AISTypes: Vector FltVector ShortVector IntVector NumVector ObjVector BitVector List

Syntax.Return: Returns a Vector containing the elements in reverse order

Syntax-Matrix.Return: Returns a Matrix containing the elements in reverse order

Syntax-NumMatrix.Return: Returns a NumMatrix ontaining the elements in reverse order

Syntax-List.Return: Returns a List containing the arguments reorganized in reverse order
